name: Classic Tee
description: Premium cotton classic tee with a timeless design. Perfect for everyday wear, this comfortable t-shirt features a relaxed fit and durable fabric that gets softer with every wash. Available in multiple colors.

name: Everyday Sneakers
description: Versatile sneakers designed for all-day comfort and style. Featuring cushioned insoles, breathable materials, and a sleek minimalist design that pairs perfectly with any outfit. Ideal for casual walks or light exercise.

name: Minimal Wallet
description: Slim, elegant leather wallet that fits comfortably in your pocket. Designed with RFID-blocking technology to protect your cards. Features multiple card slots and a cash compartment while maintaining an ultra-thin profile.

name: Modern Backpack
description: Functional and stylish backpack perfect for work, travel, or daily commutes. Features a padded laptop compartment, multiple organizational pockets, and water-resistant fabric. Ergonomic shoulder straps ensure comfort even with heavy loads.

name: Sports Watch
description: Sleek sports watch with fitness tracking capabilities. Monitor your heart rate, steps, calories, and sleep quality. Water-resistant design with long battery life makes it perfect for active lifestyles. Syncs seamlessly with your smartphone.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Premium wireless earbuds with superior sound quality and noise cancellation. Ergonomic design ensures a secure, comfortable fit during workouts or commutes. Includes portable charging case for up to 24 hours of playtime.
